name: Otherside - Chapter 1
description:
Otherside

"What you can't see can't hurt you."

Created from a mix of engaging suspense and traditional RPG elements, Otherside will be sure to shock and amaze you.

A nameless person wakes up in the middle of a strange abandoned stronghold, with nothing but the clothes on their back and many questions.

The person begins to wander, but they will soon find that there is more to this strange place than meets the eye...

Otherside has won many prestigious awards, including the-- 

Wait, what? We haven't won any awards? Um... okay.

Chapter 2 Coming January 2021!
